name: Air Shield
effect: Target allied troop takes 25% less damage from ranged attacks.

name: Air Shield
effect: Target allied troop takes 50% less damage from ranged attacks.

name: Air Shield
effect: All allied troops takes 50% less damage from ranged attacks.

name: Animate Dead
effect: Reanimates (30 + (power × 50)) health points worth of killed undead creatures in target, allied troop.

name: Animate Dead
effect: Reanimates (60 + (power × 50)) health points worth of killed undead creatures in target, allied troop.

name: Animate Dead
effect: Reanimates (160 + (power × 50)) health points worth of killed undead creatures in target, allied troop.

name: Anti-Magic
effect: Target allied troop can only be affected by level 4 or 5 spells.

name: Anti-Magic
effect: Target allied troop can only be affected by level 5 spells.

name: Anti-Magic
effect: Target allied troop is immune to spell effects.

name: Armageddon
effect: All troops take (30 + (power × 50)) points of damage.

name: Armageddon
effect: All troops take (60 + (power × 50)) points of damage.

name: Armageddon
effect: All troops take (120 + (power × 50)) points of damage.

name: Berserk
effect: Target attacks nearest troop. 1 hex affected.

name: Berserk
effect: Target attacks nearest troop. All creatures in a 2 hex radius affected.

name: Berserk
effect: Target attacks nearest troop. All creatures in a 3 hex radius affected.

name: Bless
effect: Creatures in target allied troop inflict maximum damage when they attack.

name: Bless
effect: Creatures in target allied troop inflict maximum damage +1 when they attack.

name: Bless
effect: All allied creatures inflict maximum damage +1 when they attack.

name: Blind
effect: Target enemy troop is frozen until attacked, dispelled or effect wears off. Deactivating attack is retaliated at 50% of base attack rating.

name: Blind
effect: Target enemy troop is frozen until attacked, dispelled or effect wears off. Deactivating attack is retaliated at 25% of base attack rating.

name: Blind
effect: Target enemy troop is frozen until attacked, dispelled or effect wears off. Deactivating attack is not retaliated.

name: Bloodlust
effect: Target allied troop receives a +3 attack rating bonus for hand-to-hand attacks.

name: Bloodlust
effect: Target allied troop receives a +6 attack rating bonus for hand-to-hand attacks.

name: Bloodlust
effect: All allied troops receive a +6 attack rating bonus for hand-to-hand attacks.

name: Chain Lightning
effect: Lightning bolt strikes target troop for (25 + (power x 40)) damage. Bolt strikes four troops.

name: Chain Lightning
effect: Lightning bolt strikes target troop for (50 + (power x 40)) damage. Bolt strikes five troops.

name: Chain Lightning
effect: Lightning bolt strikes target troop for (100 + (power x 40)) damage. Bolt strikes five troops.

name: Clone
effect: Creates a duplicate of target allied troop level 1-5. The duplicate can attack but is dispelled if it receives any damage.

name: Clone
effect: Creates a duplicate of target allied troop level 1-6. The duplicate can attack but is dispelled if it receives any damage.

name: Clone
effect: Creates a duplicate of target allied troop level 1-7. The duplicate can attack but is dispelled if it receives any damage.

name: Counterstrike
effect: Target allied troop can retaliate against one additional attack per round.

name: Counterstrike
effect: Target allied troop can retaliate against two additional attacks per round.

name: Counterstrike
effect: All allied troops can retaliate against two additional attacks per round.

name: Cure
effect: Removes all negative spell effects from target allied troop and heals it for (10 + (power x 5)) health points.

name: Cure
effect: Removes all negative spell effects from target allied troop and heals it for (20 + (Power x 5)) health points.

name: Cure
effect: Removes all negative spell effects from all allied troops and heals each for (30 + (Power x 5)) health points.

name: Curse
effect: The targeted enemy unit delivers minimum damage when attacking.

name: Curse
effect: The targeted enemy unit delivers (minimum damage * 0.8 - 1) when attacking. Base damage for each creature cannot be reduced to below 1.

name: Curse
effect: All enemy units deliver (minimum damage * 0.8 - 1) when attacking. Base damage for each creature cannot be reduced to below 1.

name: Death Ripple
effect: All creatures (except undead) troops take (10 + (power x 5)) damage.

name: Death Ripple
effect: All creatures (except undead) troops take (20 + (power x 5)) damage.

name: Death Ripple
effect: All creatures (except undead) troops take (30 + (power x 5)) damage.

name: Destroy Undead
effect: All undead creature troops receive ((power x 10) + 10) damage.

name: Destroy Undead
effect: All undead creature troops receive ((power x 10) + 20) damage.

name: Destroy Undead
effect: All undead creature troops receive ((power x 10) + 50) damage.

name: Dimension Door
effect: Teleports hero to target, unoccupied, visible location on the adventure map. Spell may be cast twice per day and reduces the hero's movement by three tiles for each casting.

name: Dimension Door
effect: Teleports hero to target, unoccupied, visible location on the adventure map. Spell may be cast three times per day and reduces the hero's movement by three tiles for each casting.

name: Dimension Door
effect: Teleports hero to target, unoccupied, visible location on the adventure map. Spell may be cast four times per day and reduces the hero's movement by two tiles for each casting.

name: Disguise
effect: All of the hero's creature troops are displayed as if they were composed of the most powerful creatures in the hero's army. Troop population numbers are represented normally.

name: Disguise
effect: All of the hero's creature troops are displayed as if they were composed of the most powerful creatures in the hero's army. Troop population numbers are represented by zeros.

name: Disguise
effect: All of the hero's creature troops are displayed as if they were composed of the most powerful creature in the hero's longest owned town. Troop population numbers are represented normally.

name: Dispel
effect: Removes all spell effects from target allied creature troop.

name: Dispel
effect: Removes all spell effects from target allied or enemy creature troop.

name: Dispel
effect: Removes all spell effects from all creatures and the battlefield.

name: Disrupting Ray
effect: Reduces target enemy troop's defense rating by 3.

name: Disrupting Ray
effect: Reduces target enemy troop's defense rating by 4.

name: Disrupting Ray
effect: Reduces target enemy troop's defense rating by 5.

name: Earthquake
effect: Does one point of damage to two, random castle walls during siege combat.

name: Earthquake
effect: Does one point of damage to three, random castle walls during siege combat.

name: Earthquake
effect: Does one point of damage to four, random castle walls during siege combat.

name: Fire Shield
effect: 20% of hand-to-hand damage inflicted on target allied troop is counter-inflicted on attackers of the troop.

name: Fire Shield
effect: 25% of hand-to-hand damage inflicted on target allied troop is counter-inflicted on attackers of the troop.

name: Fire Shield
effect: 30% of hand-to-hand damage inflicted on target allied troop is counter-inflicted on attackers of the troop.

name: Fire Wall
effect: Two-hex Wall. Damage is (10+ Spell Power*10).

name: Fire Wall
effect: Three-hex Wall. Damage is (20+ Spell Power*10). Cost reduced by 2.

name: Fire Wall
effect: Three-hex Wall. Damage is (50+ Spell Power*10).

name: Fireball
effect: Troops within target hex and adjacent hexes take (15 + (power x 10)) damage.

name: Fireball
effect: Troops within target hex and adjacent hexes take (30 + (power x 10)) damage.

name: Fireball
effect: Troops within target hex and adjacent hexes take (60 + (power x 10)) damage.

name: Fly
effect: Distance traveled may be up to 60% of normal movement.

name: Fly
effect: Distance traveled may be up to 80% of normal movement.

name: Fly
effect: Distance traveled may be up to 100% of normal movement.

name: Force Field
effect: A two hex-wide force wall is created at target hex. Movement through these hexes is blocked.

name: Force Field
effect: A three hex-wide force wall is created at target hex. Movement through these hexes is blocked.

name: Force Field
effect: A three hex-wide force wall is created at target hex. Movement through these hexes is blocked.

name: Forgetfulness
effect: Half of the creatures in target enemy troop with ranged attack forget to shoot.

name: Forgetfulness
effect: Target enemy troop with ranged attack cannot use its ranged attack.

name: Forgetfulness
effect: All enemy troops with ranged attacks cannot use their ranged attacks.

name: Fortune
effect: Increases luck of target, allied troop by 1.

name: Fortune
effect: Increases luck of target, allied troop by 2.

name: Fortune
effect: Increases luck of all allied troops by 2.

name: Frenzy
effect: Target troop's attack rating is increased by 100% of the troop's defense rating, and its defense rating is reduced to zero.

name: Frenzy
effect: Target troop's attack rating is increased by 150% of the troop's defense rating, and its defense rating is reduced to zero.

name: Frenzy
effect: Target troop's attack rating is increased by 200% of the troop's defense rating, and its defense rating is reduced to zero.

name: Frost Ring
effect: Troops in hexes surrounding target hex receive (15 + (power x 10)) in damage. Target hex is unaffected.

name: Frost Ring
effect: Troops in hexes surrounding target hex receive (30 + (power x 10)) in damage. Target hex is unaffected.

name: Frost Ring
effect: Troops in hexes surrounding target hex receive (60 + (power x 10)) in damage. Target hex is unaffected.

name: Haste
effect: Target allied troop's speed is increased by three hexes/turn.

name: Haste
effect: Target allied troop's speed is increased by five hexes/turn.

name: Haste
effect: All allied troops' speed is increased by five hexes/turn.

name: Hypnotize
effect: Target enemy troop of less than (10 + (power x 25)) health is put under your control. Allied troops may attack hypnotized troop without fear of retaliation.

name: Hypnotize
effect: Target enemy troop of less than (20 + (power x 25)) health is put under your control. Allied troops may attack hypnotized troop without fear of retaliation.

name: Hypnotize
effect: Target enemy troop of less than (50 + (power x 25)) health is put under your control. Allied troops may attack hypnotized troop without fear of retaliation.

name: Ice Bolt
effect: Target enemy troop receives (10 + (power x 20)) damage.

name: Ice Bolt
effect: Target enemy troop receives (20 + (power x 20)) damage.

name: Ice Bolt
effect: Target enemy troop receives (30 + (power x 20)) damage.

name: Implosion
effect: Target enemy troop receives (100 + (power × 75)) damage.

name: Implosion
effect: Target enemy troop receives (200 + (power × 75)) damage.

name: Implosion
effect: Target enemy troop receives (300 + (power × 75)) damage.

name: Inferno
effect: Strikes target hex, and all hexes within two hexes for (20 + (power x 10)) damage.

name: Inferno
effect: Strikes target hex, and all hexes within two hexes for (40 + (power x 10)) damage.

name: Inferno
effect: Strikes target hex, and all hexes within two hexes for (80 + (power x 10)) damage.

name: Land Mine
effect: Landmines are placed in four random hexes on the battlefield. A troop stepping on a mine takes ((Power x 10) + 25) damage. Enemy creatures battling on their native terrain can see the mines and can cross them safely. To all others they are invisible.

name: Land Mine
effect: Landmines are placed in four random hexes on the battlefield. A troop stepping on a mine takes ((Power x 10) + 50) damage. Enemy creatures battling on their native terrain can see the mines and can cross them safely. To all others they are invisible.

name: Land Mine
effect: Landmines are placed in four random hexes on the battlefield. A troop stepping on a mine takes ((Power x 10) + 100) damage. Enemy creatures battling on their native terrain can see the mines and can cross them safely. To all others they are invisible.

name: Lightning Bolt
effect: Target enemy creature receives (10 + (power x 25)) damage.

name: Lightning Bolt
effect: Target enemy creature receives (20 + (power x 25)) damage.

name: Lightning Bolt
effect: Target enemy creature receives (50 + (power x 25)) damage.

name: Magic Arrow
effect: Target enemy troop receives (10 + (power x 10)) damage.

name: Magic Arrow
effect: Target enemy troop receives (20 + (power x 10)) damage.

name: Magic Arrow
effect: Target enemy troop receives (30 + (power x 10)) damage.

name: Magic Mirror
effect: Enemy spells cast on targeted allied troop has a 20% chance of being redirected to a random enemy troop.

name: Magic Mirror
effect: Enemy spells cast on targeted allied troop has a 30% chance of being redirected to a random enemy troop.

name: Magic Mirror
effect: Enemy spells cast on targeted allied troop has a 40% chance of being redirected to a random enemy troop.

name: Meteor Shower
effect: Troops in target hex and adjacent hexes take (25 + (power x 25)) damage.

name: Meteor Shower
effect: Troops in target hex and adjacent hexes take (50 + (power x 25)) damage.

name: Meteor Shower
effect: Troops in target hex and adjacent hexes take (100 + (power x 25)) damage.

name: Mirth
effect: Morale of target allied troop is increased by one.

name: Mirth
effect: Morale of target allied troop is increased by two.

name: Mirth
effect: Morale of all allied troops is increased by two.

name: Misfortune
effect: Luck of target enemy troop is reduced by one.

name: Misfortune
effect: Luck of target enemy troop is reduced by two.

name: Misfortune
effect: Luck of all enemy troops is reduced by two.

name: Prayer
effect: Target allied troop's attack, defense, and speed (hexes per turn) ratings are increased by 2.

name: Prayer
effect: Target allied troop's attack, defense, and speed (hexes per turn) ratings are increased by 4.

name: Prayer
effect: All allied troop's attack, defense, and speed ratings are increased by 4.

name: Precision
effect: Target allied troop with ranged attack has its attack rating increased by 3 when making ranged attacks.

name: Precision
effect: Target allied troop with ranged attack has its attack rating increased by 6 when making ranged attacks.

name: Precision
effect: All allied troop with ranged attack has its attack rating increased by 6 when making ranged attacks.

name: Protection from Air
effect: Damage from air magic spells is reduced by 30% for target allied troop.

name: Protection from Air
effect: Damage from air magic spells is reduced by 50% for target allied troop.

name: Protection from Air
effect: Damage from air magic spells is reduced by 50% for all allied troops.

name: Protection from Earth
effect: Damage from earth magic spells is reduced by 30% for target allied troop.

name: Protection from Earth
effect: Damage from earth magic spells is reduced by 50% for target allied troop.

name: Protection from Earth
effect: Damage from earth magic spells is reduced by 50% for all allied troops.

name: Protection from Fire
effect: Damage from fire magic spells is reduced by 30% for target allied troop.

name: Protection from Fire
effect: Damage from fire magic spells is reduced by 50% for target allied troop.

name: Protection from Fire
effect: Damage from fire magic spells is reduced by 50% for all allied troops.

name: Protection from Water
effect: Damage from water magic spells is reduced by 30% for target allied troop.

name: Protection from Water
effect: Damage from water magic spells is reduced by 50% for target allied troop.

name: Protection from Water
effect: Damage from water magic spells is reduced by 50% for all allied troops.

name: Quicksand
effect: Quicksand pits are placed in 4 random hexes.

name: Quicksand
effect: Quicksand pits are placed in 6 random hexes.

name: Quicksand
effect: Quicksand pits are placed in 8 random hexes.

name: Remove Obstacle
effect: Removes one non-magic obstacle from the battlefield. Integrated obstacles, such as cliffs are not affected.

name: Remove Obstacle
effect: Removes one, non-magic obstacle from the battlefield. Fire walls can be removed. Integrated obstacles, such as cliffs are not affected.

name: Remove Obstacle
effect: Removes one non-integrated obstacle from the battlefield. Integrated obstacles, such as cliffs are not affected.

name: Resurrection
effect: Target allied troop with dead creatures has (40 + (power x 50)) health worth of creatures restored to life for the duration of the current battle.

name: Resurrection
effect: Target allied troop with dead creatures has (80 + (power x 50)) health worth of creatures restored to life permanently.

name: Resurrection
effect: Target allied troop with dead creatures has (160 + (power x 50)) health worth of creatures restored to life permanently.

name: Sacrifice
effect: Target non-undead troop is sacrificed (destroyed). Then another target dead troop has ((power + destroyed troop's base health + 3) x number of creatures sacrificed) in health total of creatures returned to life.

name: Sacrifice
effect: Target non-undead troop is sacrificed (destroyed). Then another target dead troop has ((power + destroyed troop's base health + 6) x number of creatures sacrificed) in health total of creatures returned to life.

name: Sacrifice
effect: Target non-undead troop is sacrificed (destroyed). Then another target dead troop has ((power + destroyed troop's base health + 10) x number of creatures sacrificed) in health total of creatures returned to life.

name: Scuttle Boat
effect: Spell has 50% chance of destroying a boat, unless occupied.

name: Scuttle Boat
effect: Spell has 75% chance of destroying a boat, unless occupied.

name: Scuttle Boat
effect: Spell destroys a boat, unless occupied.

name: Shield
effect: Hand-to-hand damage delivered to target allied troop is reduced by 15%.

name: Shield
effect: Hand-to-hand damage delivered to target allied troop is reduced by 30%.

name: Shield
effect: Hand-to-hand damage delivered to all allied troops is reduced by 30%.

name: Slayer
effect: Target allied troop's attack rating is increased by eight against behemoths, dragons, and hydras.

name: Slayer
effect: Target allied troop's attack rating is increased by eight against behemoths, dragons, hydras, devils and angels.

name: Slayer
effect: Target allied troop's attack rating is increased by eight against behemoths, dragons, hydras, devils, angels and titans.

name: Slow
effect: Target enemy troop's speed is reduced to 25% of normal.

name: Slow
effect: Target enemy troop's speed is reduced to 50% of normal.

name: Slow
effect: All enemy troops' speed ratings are reduced to 50% of normal.

name: Sorrow
effect: Target enemy troop's morale rating is reduced by 1.

name: Sorrow
effect: Target enemy troop's morale rating is reduced by 2.

name: Sorrow
effect: All enemy troops' morale rating is reduced by 2.

name: Stone Skin
effect: Target allied troop's defense rating is increased by 3.

name: Stone Skin
effect: Target allied troop's defense rating is increased by 6.

name: Stone Skin
effect: All allied troops' defense ratings are increased by 6.

name: Summon Air Elemental
effect: Summons a troop of air elementals containing creatures amount of (power x 2).

name: Summon Air Elemental
effect: Summons a troop of air elementals containing creatures amount of (power x 3).

name: Summon Air Elemental
effect: Summons a troop of air elementals containing creatures amount of (power x 4).

name: Summon Boat
effect: Summons one of your hero's boats to their current location. If none of those boats are available, then one of your other heroes' boats is summoned. Spell has a 50% chance of working. The spell fails if there are no unoccupied boats available.

name: Summon Boat
effect: Summons one of your hero's boats to their current location. If none of those boats are available, then one of your other heroes' boats is summoned. Spell has a 75% chance of working. If there are no unoccupied boats available, a new one is created. There are a maximum of 64 boats allowed on the Adventure Map at one time. The spell fails if all are occupied.

name: Summon Boat
effect: Summons one of your hero's boats to their current location. If none of those boats are available, then one of your other heroes' boats is summoned. If there are no unoccupied boats available, a new one is created. There are a maximum of 64 boats allowed on the Adventure Map at one time. Spell has a 100% chance of working, unless all 64 boats are occupied.

name: Summon Earth Elemental
effect: A troop containing (power x 2) earth elementals appears on the side of the casting player.

name: Summon Earth Elemental
effect: A troop containing (power x 3) earth elementals appears on the side of the casting player.

name: Summon Earth Elemental
effect: A troop containing (power x 4) earth elementals appears on the side of the casting player.

name: Summon Fire Elemental
effect: A troop containing (2 x power) fire elementals appears on the side of the casting player.

name: Summon Fire Elemental
effect: A troop containing (3 x power) fire elementals appears on the side of the casting player.

name: Summon Fire Elemental
effect: A troop containing (4 x power) fire elementals appears on the side of the casting player.

name: Summon Water Elemental
effect: A troop containing (power x 2) water elementals appears on the side of the casting player. Only one type of elemental can be summoned.

name: Summon Water Elemental
effect: A troop containing (power x 3) water elementals appears on the side of the casting player. Only one type of elemental can be summoned.

name: Summon Water Elemental
effect: A troop containing (power x 4) water elementals appears on the side of the casting player. Only one type of elemental can be summoned.

name: Teleport
effect: Target allied troop instantly moves to an unoccupied target hex. Troop cannot teleport over walls or moats.

name: Teleport
effect: Target allied troop instantly moves to an unoccupied target hex. Troop cannot teleport over walls.

name: Teleport
effect: Target allied troop instantly moves to an unoccupied target hex.

name: Titan's Lightning Bolt
effect: Does 600 damage. Requires Titan's Thunder.

name: Titan's Lightning Bolt
effect: Does 600 damage. Requires Titan's Thunder.

name: Titan's Lightning Bolt
effect: Does 600 damage. Requires Titan's Thunder.

name: Town Portal
effect: Adventure Map Teleport, casting hero is teleported to the nearest allied town. 300 movement points are expended when the spell is cast.

name: Town Portal
effect: Adventure Map Teleport, casting hero may teleport to any allied town with no visiting hero. 300 movement points are expended when the spell is cast.

name: Town Portal
effect: Adventure Map Teleport, any allied unoccupied town. Deducted movement points are 200 points.

name: View Air
effect: Displays the location of all artifacts on the view world screen.

name: View Air
effect: Displays the location of all artifacts and heroes on the view world screen.

name: View Air
effect: Displays the location of all artifacts, heroes and towns.

name: View Earth
effect: Displays the location of all loose resources on the view world screen.

name: View Earth
effect: Displays the location of all mines and loose resources on the view world screen.

name: View Earth
effect: Displays the entire terrain, all mines and loose resources on the view world screen.

name: Visions
effect: Displays number of monsters in a wandering monster troop and whether or not the troop will offer to join the casting hero's army. Range is equal to power or three, whichever is greater.

name: Visions
effect: Displays number of monsters in a wandering monster troop, whether or not the troop will offer to join the casting hero's army, an enemy hero's primary skill stats, and the composition and quantity of the hero's army. Range is (power x 2) or three, whichever is greater.

name: Visions
effect: Displays number of monsters in a wandering monster troop, whether or not the troop will offer to join the casting hero's army, an enemy hero's primary skill stats, the composition and quantity of the hero's army, and an enemy town's statistics and garrison composition and quantity. Range is (power x 3) or three, whichever is greater.

name: Water Walk
effect: The casting hero may follow a movement path across water, provided the end destination is an unoccupied location on land. Water movement may be up to 60% of the hero's normal movement.

name: Water Walk
effect: The casting hero may follow a movement path across water, provided the end destination is an unoccupied location on land. Water movement may be up to 80% of the hero's normal movement.

name: Water Walk
effect: The casting hero may follow a movement path across water, provided the end destination is an unoccupied location on land. Water movement may be made at the hero's full, normal movement.

name: Weakness
effect: Target enemy troop's attack rating is reduced by three.

name: Weakness
effect: Target enemy troop's attack rating is reduced by six.

name: Weakness
effect: All enemy troops' attack ratings are reduced by six.
